description: This is an advanced course in the area of political thought. The topic, a detailed study of either major works or themes in political philosophy, varies with each offering. Prerequisites: Political Science 220 and one course in the subfield.
name: Sem:Studies Pol Thought
notes: Only open to rising seniors during web registration.
prerequisites: Prerequisites: Political Science 220 and one course in the subfield.
title: Seminar in Political Theory
